actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide that certain netting belts used in connection with the growing and harvesting of mushrooms be admitted free of duty.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to admit certain netting belts used in the growing and harvesting of mushrooms free of customs duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide that certain netting belts used in connection with the growing and harvesting of mushrooms be admitted free of duty.
